channel.description: Recent content in fitness on Marcel Jurtz

item.title: Step Outside Your Comfort Zone!
item.description: We humans tend to make ourselves comfortable. We take the easiest way we can find. But there are so many things we miss this way. In many cases it is the small things that make a big difference. Today I would like to show you how I have taken such a step and what has changed since then. Photo by Jenny Hill on Unsplash As a child I did athletics for several years.
